SELECT tp.user_id as userId,tp.eq_id,td.name,tc.eq_status,tv.positioning_data,td.avatar,tc.imei,td.age,tp.typeof as type_of FROM user_eq tp INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM user_eq WHERE user_id=#{userId}) tt ON tp.eq_id=tt.eq_id AND tp.typeof='2' INNER JOIN user td ON tp.user_id=td.id INNER JOIN equipment tc ON td.imei=tc.imei LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM positionig ORDER BY cratetime DESC LIMIT 1) tv ON tc.imei=tv.imei WHERE tt.follow=1 and isDelete=0

SELECT tp.user_id,td.imei,tc.name,tc.avatar,tt.follow,td.lordpower,td.eq_status,td.bluetooth_type,tp.typeof as type_of FROM user_eq tp INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM user_eq WHERE typeof=0 AND user_id=#{userId}) tt ON tp.eq_id=tt.eq_id and tp.typeof=2 INNER JOIN equipment td ON tp.eq_id=td.id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM user WHERE isDelete=0) tc ON tp.user_id=tc.id ORDER BY tt.follow DESC
